item.title: Fly tip and rats on Eynsham Drive, 13th June
item.description:
Dear Royal Borough of Greenwich, Please see the photo of what is now a rubbish dump on this private road. This pile of rubbish continues to grow. Yellow builders bags of waste have recently been deposited and the mountain of rubbish is attracting vermin. This simply cannot be right. The rubbish is on front of the gates of the council-owned Thistlebrook Industrial Estate. I understand this is private land and the responsibility of clearing this waste falls to the landowner. However, the local authority are responsible for serving a notice of enforcement on the landowner. The local authority can carry out work and subsequently reclaim their costs. The area is undergoing regeneration, new residents have moved in and we need all stakeholders to play their part in maintaining and improving the area. I look forward to your considered response. James

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eynsham Drive, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
